eoreader.bands.index.DSWI¶

DSWI(bands: dict) → xarray.core.dataarray.DataArray[source]¶

Disease water stress index: https://www.indexdatabase.de/db/i-single.php?id=106

Parameters

bands (dict) – Bands as {band_name: xr.DataArray}

Returns

Computed index

Return type

xr.DataArray
